description:
Advocating For The Injured Throughout Mississippi

Serving the residents of Mississippi and southwestern Tennessee for the past 27 years, the law firm of Wood and Carlton, P.C, has earned a reputation as one of the region's top legal practices for the injured and disabled.

Our law office in Pontotoc, Mississippi, is one of three we have in the state, each offering convenient access to high-quality, effective legal representation to those suffering from a debilitating injury or devastating loss caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Our award-winning attorneys possess more than 75 years of combined legal experience among them, and our law firm has secured millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients.

Offering comprehensive advocacy and support to those in need, we handle all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, as well as medical malpractice, workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims. No matter the circumstances surrounding your case or the complexities involved, you can trust us to help you recover the finances you need to support yourself and your family.

Top-Rated, Award-Winning Counsel

Peer-review rated AV Preeminent or Distinguished* through Martindale-Hubbell and voted among the top trial lawyers in the country, the legal professionals at Wood and Carlton, P.C. are fully prepared to work to do what it takes to help you achieve the justice you seek.

For more information, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation, and we will never charge a fee from you unless we obtain compensation on your behalf.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards
